issue.title: [CF 1129] Spell cast tracker with unit name or unit id ?
issue.body:
Possible to track lets say Battle medic Rogg his Earthen Barrier cast without having him as target or focus by using his name or unit id ? For now i track focus spell cast by spell id.


> Posted by CurseForge user Drozo_Qoocla | Imported from CurseForge issue #1129 | Raw

comments.body:
No, it isn't.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
